text: Rebeca Minguela is a Spanish entrepreneur and startup advisor. Founder and CEO of Blink Booking, now Blink by Groupon, an award-winning mobile app to book hotels last minute in Europe. When Blink was acquired by Groupon in September 2013, she joined Groupon. Rebeca is co-founder of Global Impact Rating, startup selected for the Harvard Innovation Lab - iLab (Harvard Business School Incubator) in 2015. Rebeca was selected Young Global Leader of World Economic Forum in March 2017. == Blink Booking == Minguela started Blink Booking in 2011 a travel mobile app to book hotels last minute in Europe. Blink Booking was the first startup of a platform aimed at fostering entrepreneurship in Spain. She joined Blink as full-time CEO in March 2012 due to an issue with her co-founder and to be able to manage the rapid growth of the company (as stated in Harvard Business School case about Blink Booking ). Blink Booking got investment from tech and travel investors (SoftTech VC, ProFounders – Brent Hoberman, Charles Petruccelli and American Express Travel (UVET Italy), Radisson Hotels, Kibo ventures and others ). Blink app was available in 6 languages, Android, iOS / iPhone and HTML5 in 8 different European countries. Blink Booking was advertised in Spanish and Italian TV, and the TV advert "The Lady in White" was awarded with the "Sol de Bronce" award in 2013 (Festival Iberoamericano de Publicidad, FIAP). In September 2013, Blink Booking was acquired by Groupon to strengthen its travel and mobile business. Blink Booking is now "Blink by Groupon", and Minguela started then working for Groupon. == Public speaking, press and awards == Minguela and Blink Booking (the company she started and managed) have been mentioned in the press in several countries with features in publications including Forbes, The Economist, Financial Times, The Sun (printed edition), El País, El Mundo, Il Sole 24 Ore, and many others. Minguela's entrepreneurship platform and Blink Booking are also the subject of a business case at Harvard Business School. Minguela has been a speaker at several events and conferences, among them: Harvard European Conference 2015 \- sharing the panel with the Director General for the European Commission -, Spain Tech Week Silicon Valley/ Seattle 2014, Startup Spain 3.0., "Red Innova 2013" Blink has been Top rated app by Apple Store and Google Play in several countries. It was also awarded "Travel Pioneer of the Year 2012" (Travolution Awards, from Travel Weekly), "Travel App of the Week" by Female First, and was finalist of 5th edition of Open Talent Award 2013 to most innovative start-ups. Blink Booking TV advert "The Lady in White" was awarded with the "Sol de Bronce" award in 2013 (Festival Iberoamericano de Publicidad, FIAP).
